mapper.sql:
FROM nct.infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgDelNy=0
AND a.ifcgDelNy = 1 AND a.ifcgDelNy = 0
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND a.ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND a.ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: select a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy from nct.infrCodeGroup a where a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}

select a.ifcdSeq , a.ifcdName , a.ifcdDelNy
from nct.infrCode a where a.ifcdSeq = #{ifcdSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE from infrCodeGroup a where 1=1 AND a.ifcgSeq=#{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifcgDelNy=1 where 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
